title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 January 2009 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 05:25): XWiki.9jainform was modified by XWiki.9jainform (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/9jainform  
npm - (10/01/2009 06:34): in trunks/web there's now a "gwt' 'standard' and 'wysiwyg' diirectory. these build trunks/web/standard/target/xwiki-web-standard-1.8-SNAPSHOT.war and web/wysiwyg/target/xwiki-web-wysiwyg-1.8-SNAPSHOT.war ... does this mean we have to choose to deploy either app and need to choose "wysiwyg" to get new wysiwyg behavior described in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise171 ??  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:44): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:45): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:51): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:55): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:57): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 12:57): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 18:35): XWiki.ReneOkouya was modified by XWiki.ReneOkouya (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ReneOkouya  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:37): when i do a build, i see lots of "[WARNING] File encoding has not been set, using platform encoding ISO-8859-1, i.e. build is platform dependent!" do I get rid of these warnings by removing or changing my environment vars, e.g. LANG=en\_US.ISO8859-1 and  MM\_CHARSET=iso-8859-1  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:41): npm: never got those, no idea. In what maven module for ex?  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:41): unsenv'd the envars and got '[WARNING] File encoding has not been set, using platform encoding ANSI\_X3.4-1968, i.e. build is platform dependent!'  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:42): in any case this is a maven thing  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:42): i am doing   
npm - (10/01/2009 19:42): golem-192-.../xe-trunk/trunks> mvn install -Pmysql  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:42): [INFO] Scanning for projects...  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:42): so what should I set LANG to?  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:43): UTF-8 ??  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:44): no idea  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:44): i'm building based off current 1.8 trunk  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:44): it just works for me and my LANG isn't set (I'm on mac)  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:44): i never saw that before  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:44): it seems like a recent change  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:44): how do you build trunks?  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:44): there's no pom.xml there  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:44): ah there's one actually... hmm let me check it  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:45): ah no it's one I had created a while ago  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:45): it's not committed  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:45): i have a pom there  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:45): weird thing is it says <artifactId>xwiki-platform-externals</artifactId>  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:46): there's no trunks  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:46): see http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:50): i was following instructions per http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building "For example to build all modules for MySQL go in trunks and type mvn install -Pmysql."  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:50): this needs to be updated we had a trunks before  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 19:51): Community.Building was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Fixed reference to old trunks) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 19:51): fixed  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:54): thanks  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:56): it would be more helpful if 'For example to build a module for MySQL type mvn install -Pmysql in that module's directory.' was more specific or gave an example  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:56): what commands in specific directories needed to build just a WAR and a XAR of the snapshot  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:58): also the link  assoc'd with "platform's top level pom.xml file" is dead  
npm - (10/01/2009 19:58): ^^^ http://fisheye2.atlassian.com/browse/~raw,r=trunk/xwiki/platform/pom/trunk/pom.xml  
npm - (10/01/2009 20:00): also, http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository needs updating as well  
npm - (10/01/2009 20:00): fyi, doing the build in 'web' didn't get the strange maven message caused by LANG  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:07): more specific? How?  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:07): it completely depends on what you're doing  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:08): there' s an example already  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:08): mvn install -Pmysql  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:08): we have 7 top level project each with tons of modules  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:09): checking the file  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:10): just re-read and I don't the doc pb  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:10): s/don't/don't see/  
npm - (10/01/2009 20:10): I got the "trunks" in which i did toplevel mvn install ... by following directions in http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository which says "developer access" ... https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/trunks  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:10): you need to read "Building with maven" first of course (which comes just before)  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:11): ok re trunks that's inside the platform project  
npm - (10/01/2009 20:12): the broken link is inside (!) box at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building#HBuildingforaspecificdatabase  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 20:13): Community.Building was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Fixed top level platform pom URL) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:13): ok file fixed  
vmassol\_ - (10/01/2009 20:14): npm: I've re-read http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository and I don't see what's not correct  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 20:16): Community.SourceRepository was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Minor improvements) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository  
xwikibot - (10/01/2009 20:16): Community.SourceRepository was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added platform link) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository
